name: Knights & Demons 2
overview: 6 years have passed since the brave Bakelor Knights of Bakelor liberated the world of Garnick from the attack of the demonic hordes from the Underworld. 6 years of peace and happiness that are once again threatened by the demons' thirst for vengeance. Sheltered in the dead of night, they have infiltrated through the dungeons of Castle Garnick, seizing all weapons and fiercely guarding them in these gloomy outbuildings. You, the brave fellow who commanded the troops in the previous battle, have volunteered to infiltrate among the hosts and recover the weapons with which to expel, once and for all, the diabolical threat from the prosperous lands of Garnick.
